reviewText: Fantastic, beautifully restored black and white, star-studded film depicting a supposedly happily married man who ends up taking a lover whom he gets pregnant, and then marries while he is still married to his current wife (Joan Fontaine). Now, this traveling salesman has two wives, neither of which knows about the other. Not to mention his lover gives birth to a boy, his son. Lots of twists and turns in this story. You almost feel sorry for this tortured man who feels sick with deceit and lies as he leads a double life.In the end both women find out about one another, and realize they are both married to the same man. That may seem commonplace these days, but back in the 1950's bigamy was definitely a 'no-no'.But wait until the end to see how all of this tangled mess works itself out - some may like the ending and feel justice has been served, and others may think this confused bigamist didn't get what he deserved. You decide... As the saying goes: revenge is best served up cold...
summary: Men Lead Lives of Quiet Desperation
Title: N/A

reviewText: Much like a film noir for women, this is a cross between a soap opera and a early 1950's crime story. Nicely restored, it boasts a first class cast and solid direction. Although the subject is dated, the even-handed approach makes for compelling, and thoughtful, viewing.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This story shows how a little "innocent" fun can cause profound sorrow for yourself and those whom your decisions affect.The broader point is that the act that causes pain is not limited to an act of bigamy. It can be as "innocent" as a bit of petty thievery or a minor "sin" about which you are prepared to employ lies to hide your guilt.There are an infinite number of "harmless" behaviors that Nature will condemn and expose for all the world to see.The bedrock message is : Conduct your life as if you are continuously seen on live TV show that is anchored by a very judgmental host
summary: A profound message in a simple story

reviewText: Love old classic movies . This a  very good movie.  A man who must do the right thing and ends up married to two women at the same time . Watch and see what happens.

reviewText: This is an unexpected tale of a moral but lonely man who suddenly finds himself in love with and married to two women.  He is aware of his actions and their consequences, as the ending proves.
